changeSet.author: jmiranda (generated)
jmiranda (generated)
changeSet.comment: Allow all locations to be managed by this deployment.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE location SET managed_locally = 1;

changeSet.author: jmiranda
jmiranda (generated)
changeSet.comment: The sort order is used to sort the different event types chronologically.

changeSet.author: jmiranda (generated)
changeSet.comment: The event status field is used to distinguish between INITAL, PENDING, COMPLETE states.

changeSet.author: jmiranda
changeSet.comment: Shipment items are now tied to shipments, rather than containers.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE shipment_item AS s INNER JOIN container AS c ON c.id = s.container_id SET s.shipment_id = c.shipment_id WHERE s.shipment_id is null or s.shipment_id = 0

changeSet.author: jmiranda
changeSet.comment: Changed named for the Shipped event type.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE event_type SET name = 'Shipped' where id = 4 and name = 'Departed';

changeSet.author: jmiranda
changeSet.comment: Drop all indices because none of them have a corresponding foreign key constraint. Generated the SQL for all 'alter table' statements using 'grails schema-export'.

changeSet.author: jmiranda
changeSet.comment: Recreate all indices/foreign key constraints. Generated the SQL for all 'alter table' statements using 'grails schema-export'.

changeSet.author: jmiranda
changeSet.comment: The parent container of a shipment item must be nullable.
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE shipment_item MODIFY COLUMN container_id BIGINT(20) DEFAULT NULL;

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM transaction_type;

changeSet.sql: update product set product_type_id = null;

changeSet.author: jmiranda
changeSet.sql: delete from product_type;

changeSet.author: jmiranda
changeSet.comment: Remove all secondary product categories that have a null product category index value.
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM product_category WHERE categories_idx IS NULL;

changeSet.author: jmiranda
changeSet.comment: Assign Boston warehouse to all users.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE user SET warehouse_id = 1 WHERE warehouse_id IS NULL;

changeSet.author: mgoodrich
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `shipment_workflow` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `version` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `last_updated` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `shipment_type_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `shipment_type_id` (`shipment_type_id`), KEY `FKD584C4C4FF77FF9B` (`shipment_type_id`), CONSTRAINT `FKD584C4C4FF77FF9B` FOREIGN KEY (`shipment_type_id`) REFERENCES `shipment_type` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

changeSet.author: mgoodrich
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `shipment_workflow_container_type` ( `shipment_workflow_container_types_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `container_type_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `container_types_idx` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `FKDEF5AD1317A6E251` (`container_type_id`), CONSTRAINT `FKDEF5AD1317A6E251` FOREIGN KEY (`container_type_id`) REFERENCES `container_type` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: mgoodrich
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `shipment_workflow_reference_number_type` ( `shipment_workflow_reference_number_types_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `reference_number_type_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `reference_number_types_idx` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `FK4BB27241154F600` (`reference_number_type_id`), CONSTRAINT `FK4BB27241154F600` FOREIGN KEY (`reference_number_type_id`) REFERENCES `reference_number_type` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
